title: PAX Aus 2015 Skin
body:
Heya,

I just had a crackin good time at PAX in Melbourne, and came home to find no new skin on my account (PAX tickets purchased Dec 2014). Is there any word on when these will be coming through? I was initially told it was going to happen in line with PAX.

Cheers.

replies.body: Hi, did you send the proof of receipt into the PAX email address?

Hi Seppy, you're certainly eligible for the skin. (Ticket purchased before 4th May 2015)

Did you submit your ticket receipt and Summoner name to pax2015@riotgames.com?

We check for submissions every week and distribute the skins in a batch.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Gehirn,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=MmEPzY4J,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-11-03T03:55:50.224+0000)
>
> Hi Seppy, you're certainly eligible for the skin. (Ticket purchased before 4th May 2015)
> 
> Did you submit your ticket receipt and Summoner name to pax2015@riotgames.com?
> 
> We check for submissions every week and distribute the skins in a batch.

Yeah, I attached the receipt showing date of purchase and listed 4 summoner names (one for each PAX ticket on the receipt). 

I just checked my email and found a response to my support ticket saying that if I don't get it by the 15th of November I should get in touch again.

Thanks for the response though, much appreciated!
i sent my proof in around the time of opl finals when it was announced still no skin for me or my brother.
Just got an email from player support ( I had to keep bumping tickets up for response) that they have added the Forsaken Jayce skin to my account.
Gives me some hope... I've been waiting since Sep 6... No response at all.

Having the same problem as well. Submitted my proof  on the 5th may and bought my tickets when they were released. Still no skin, I've submitted a ticket after pax and was told they were working on it cause it was so close after pax i'd have to wait a few weeks, and now well... still nothing :(

I'm also in the same boat with this had 2 3 day passes my myself and my partner.

I submitted the email to the pax2015 email and got the response saying they would confirm that it was a genuine confirmation id for my pax tickets. 

Didn't receive anything further after that, so I submitted a support ticket yesterday and got sent a link by Riot Pip to the Worlds 2015 redemption site (which isn't actually what I asked assistance with.) so any further news on when this is going through?

PS PAX Aus was boring without you Riot :( missed you guys being there so much.

I too am waiting.. have logged a ticket w/Support to check on the status, but support told me to email pax2015 email again. I have now emailed three times but have no reply that they have received my request. I have sent proof of my ticket purchase 4/12/14.

I was still waiting, thinking there was just a delay.
I have emailed them again and am awaiting a response.
